Crafting an Item Frame with Glass Panes makes a Glass Item Frame. The frame itself will not render while an item is inside, and items inside render a bit larger than a normal Item Frame.
Some items will display differently on these frames. Shields will be a bit larger, and thus at a 1:1 scale. Banners will be scaled down to be square, and usable as wallpaper.
This feature was introduced in Minecraft 1.11.
